original_text: In those days when the number of disciples was increasing, the Hellenistic Jews among them complained against the Hebraic Jews because their widows were being overlooked in the daily distribution of food.
korean_text: 그 때에 제자가 더 많아졌는데 헬라파 유대인들이 자기의 과부들이 매일의 구제에 빠지므로 히브리파 사람을 원망하니

sentences.original_text: when the number of disciples was increasing
the Hellenistic Jews among them complained
because their widows were being overlooked
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들의 과부들이 소홀히 여김을 받고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: in the daily distribution of food
